title: 179: The Enchiridion, by Epictetus
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: The writings of Epictetus are some of the only stoic manuscripts that survive. The Enchiridion is his essential handbook for the budding acolyte of Stoicism.
itunes:author: Does it matter? We are unaffected by your praise.
itunes:subtitle: But, you know, dispassionately
itunes:summary: The writings of Epictetus are some of the only stoic manuscripts that survive. The Enchiridion is his essential handbook for the budding acolyte of Stoicism.
itunes:title: 179: The Enchiridion, by Epictetus
